Transcription for 1882861

Newport Rock Collecting is a social history and archiving project by Winding Snake Productions,
funded by the National Lottery Heritage Fund, and in partnership with Newport Museum.
Since 2019 the project has been gathering memories and artifacts from people who attended
gigs in Newport between 1970 and 2010 for a new audio archive and exhibition celebrating
Newport's commitment to bands, gigs and music.
To hear new uploads from the audio archive keep checking the People's Collection Wales.
For films, exhibition and podcast updates go to www.rockcollecting.co.uk or www.windingsnake.com
